title: Securing Access to Reproductive and Other Healthcare Services

enrichment.summary: This executive order directs the Department of Health and Human Services to take actions that protect access to reproductive healthcare, including abortion and related services, especially amid changing state laws. It focuses on ensuring non-discrimination by healthcare providers, improving data collection on reproductive health outcomes, and supporting patients traveling across state lines to receive care.
potential_concerns: Legal conflicts may arise between federal directives and restrictive state abortion laws, creating uncertainty for providers and patients.
Healthcare providers may face challenges balancing compliance with federal non-discrimination laws and state restrictions, leading to hesitancy or delays in treatment.
Efforts to improve data collection on reproductive health could raise privacy concerns for patients.
Traveling across state lines for reproductive care might increase burdens on patients, especially those with limited resources or in underserved areas.
